thread.title: Pursuit of 'El Chapo': Officials say drug lord injured in latest escape
thread.title_full: Pursuit of 'El Chapo': Officials say drug lord injured in latest escape | OregonLive.com

author: Associated Press
title: Pursuit of 'El Chapo': Officials say drug lord injured in latest escape
text:
MEXICO CITY (AP) â€” The pursuit of escaped drug lord Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman in recent weeks moved into the mountains of northwestern Mexico and officials think he injured a leg and his face in evading capture, the government said late Friday.
In a statement, Mexico's security Cabinet provided no details on when or exactly where the operation took place. It said efforts to recapture Guzman have been continuing since his daring July 11 escape from his cell through a tunnel dug under the maximum security prison where he was being held not far from Mexico City.
